title: Control Technology Package
content: The optional Control Technology Package with the Riese & MÃ¼ller Control Technology is synonymous with safety and dynamism: the perfectly tuned full suspension of the rear swing arm ensures a sporty riding experience and the best traction even at high speeds. The active rear swing arm, optimised front wheel suspension and co-sprung luggage carrier form the core of the Control Technology. The result is powerful propulsion and sporty riding without any loss of energy.
